lead_paragraph: KELLER--Dolores Elaine, Ph.D. (nee Greenstein) of Piermont NY, born October 29, 1926, died January 29, 2016. Dr. Keller's Ph.D. from NYU, Chair of Biology, Pace University; taught Animal Behavior & Human Sexuality; pioneering Sex Therapist; researcher in microbiology, marine biology, primate behavior. Author/artist/musician. Wife of late Martin E. Keller; mother of Steven E. Keller, Ph.D. (Marjorie); late Kevin E. Keller, Ph.D. (Laurel Burns); Wendy K. Epstein, M.D. (Hon. Larry Lynn); beloved grandmother of Caroline, Daniel, Michael, Christina, Bryan, Brendan, Patrick and Emily; great-grandmother to Madelyn, Lyla, Keegan, Kevin and Brendan. Services private. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KELLER, DOLORES ELAINE
